title: MotoGP 20 + 2 DLCs
body:
MotoGP 20 + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Racing, Sports, 3D, Motorcycles
Company: Milestone
Languages: ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 16.7 GB
Repack Size: from 8.9 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 6 other (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on MotoGP_20-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-motogp20.iso (17,925,724,160 bytes)
  • 2 DLCs: Historic Pack & VIP Multiplier are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of language packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 16.7 to 8.9~9.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 7-15 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 20 GB
  • Language can be changed by editing “Engine\Binaries\ThirdParty\Steamworks\Steamv142\Win64\hlm.ini” file
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911

Game Description

Rev up your engines for a new chapter of the MotoGP™ series!

MotoGP™20 is back with a revived Managerial Career mode and more.

Awaiting you are even more realistic graphics, improved gameplay, a new way to experience the historic content and all the excitement of the 2020 season!

You can skip downloading of language packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin (can’t be used in game)

In example, if you want to launch the game with French UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-french.bin & all main files (01-05)
